mapper.select: SELECT seq, main, type, address, contact_seq FROM contact_msgsns
SELECT seq, main, type, address, contact_seq FROM contact_msgsns WHERE 1=1 AND seq=#{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contact_msgsns ( main, type, address, contact_seq ) VALUES ( #{main}, #{type}, #{address}, #{contact_seq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE contact_msgsns SET main=#{main}, type=#{type}, address=#{address} WHERE seq=#{seq}
